data.actual_result: Only the [1] disappear, not the dot
data.short_description: Marking a DM as read via Quick Switcher does remove the [1] badge but doesn't remove the unread white dot
data.steps_to_repro: - Receive a DM from someone but don't read it - Open Quick Switcher  - Long-press the user's avatar who DMed you, located just below the search bar on the left - Mark as Read
